title: Kan lawng hian ram nuam lam chu pan se
lyrics:
Ka lawng hian ram nuam lam chu pan se, 
Lalpa thu chu puang darh zelin; 
Mi dang tlu turte chu hruai trin, 
Chawlhna nuam tak thlen thlenga beiin.

Chawlhna nuamah chuan mittui a hul ang, 
Chu chatuan chawlhna ram nuam takah chuan, 
Tlan sate lawm hla saa auvin kan hria ang, 
Chu Lalpa lawmnaa lo kal khawmin.

Kan lawng hian ram nuam lam chu pan se, 
Hlau lovin i kal zel ang u; 
Lawng chawlhna nuam chu ka hnaih ta e, 
Chawlhna eng nuam tak chu kan hmu ang.

Ram nuama tlang mawi tak leh eng chu, 
Chu chu pangpar mawiin a bawm; 
Tah chua min Tlantu leh Hmangaihtu, 
Fakin kan lawm hla chu kan sa ang.

Ram nuam atang chuan thlifim a tleh, 
Chutah chuan khua a lo varin; 
Tin, chhandamtu hmel ka hmu ang a, 
Tah chuan thih leh natte a reh ang.
